Title: Bulbbul
Actors: Tripti Dimri, Avinash Tiwary, Rahul Bose, Parambrata Chattopadhyay
Plot: A man returns home after years to find his brother's child bride now grown up and abandoned, and his ancestral village plagued by mysterious deaths.

Title: 3 Idiots
Writer: Rajkumar Hirani (screenplay), Abhijat Joshi (screenplay), Vidhu Vinod Chopra (screenplay associate), Abhijat Joshi (story), Chetan Bhagat (novel)
Actors: Aamir Khan, Madhavan, Sharman Joshi, Kareena Kapoor
Plot: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

Title: Shakuntala Devi
Writer: Anu Menon, Nayanika Mahtani, Ishita Moitra (dialogue)
Actors: Vidya Balan, Sanya Malhotra, Jishu Sengupta, Amit Sadh
Plot: Shakuntala Devi, a mathematician's journey to become 'The Human Computer' and her relationship with her daughter.

Title: The Body
Actors: José Coronado, Hugo Silva, Belén Rueda, Aura Garrido
Plot: A detective searches for the body of a femme fatale which has gone missing from a morgue.

Title: Titanic
Actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates
Plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
